title: Was Obama Ranked ‘Worst President Since World War II’ in a New Poll?
subtitle: An outdated poll from 2014 was drastically misrepresented by a number of right-wing sites and pundits, none of whom appears to have correctly sourced the claim.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Former U.S. president Barack Obama was ranked the worst president since World War II in "a recent poll."
